name: Realistic Job and Culture Previews (RJP)
description: Scenario-based previews that help candidates understand role expectations and cultural fit.
skills: role preview, culture fit, engagement, expectation setting

name: Situational Judgement Tests (SJT)
description: Interactive scenarios to assess judgement and behavioral fit early in hiring.
skills: situational judgement, decision making, behavioral fit

name: Universal Competency Framework (UCF)
description: Framework mapping role requirements to behavioral competencies across levels.
skills: competency framework, behavioral competencies, role mapping

name: Virtual Assessment & Development Centers
description: End-to-end digital assessment and development centers with global delivery and automated reporting.
skills: assessment center, simulations, dashboards, candidate experience

name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire (OPQ)
description: Personality assessment measuring working preferences aligned to business needs.
skills: work preferences, behavioral style, teamwork, resilience

name: SHL Motivational Questionnaire (MQ)
description: Assesses motivational drivers to support engagement and performance.

name: SHL Cognitive Assessments
description: Measures learning potential reasoning and ability to perform in any role.

name: Technical Skills Assessments
description: MCQ-based assessments covering 200+ technical skills across domains.
skills: technical skills, cloud, data engineering, devops

name: Coding Simulations
description: Real-life coding problems solved in an online IDE to assess programming ability.

name: Language Proficiency Tests
description: AI-powered assessments of spoken and written language proficiency.
skills: spoken english, written english, grammar, fluency

name: Call Center Simulations
description: Simulated contact center environment to assess service quality and accuracy.
skills: contact center, customer service, task simulation

name: Business Skills Assessments
description: Assessments covering computer literacy and essential workplace skills.
skills: business skills, computer literacy, workplace productivity

name: Job-Focused Assessments (JFA)
description: Short job-relevant assessments predicting role readiness and success.
skills: job readiness, role fit, performance prediction

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Contact Center
description: Predicts success in contact center roles using role-specific skills.

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Retail
description: Evaluates customer focus and adaptability for retail roles.

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Manufacturing
description: Assesses reliability safety awareness and quality focus.

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Graduate Roles
description: Measures learning agility and future potential for graduates.

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Professional Roles
description: Evaluates job-specific skills and reskilling potential.

name: Job-Focused Assessment – Managerial Roles
description: Assesses leadership capability and people management skills.
